body: I toyed with solving this using GDB's Python API, and actually got quite far, but eventually slammed into the same problem the heap dumper has run into: I have only DWARF type information for global and stack roots, but only Go type information for interface values. Right now I don't think we have a reliable way to map from a Go type to a DWARF type. We'll probably have to fix that for the heap dumper to be robust.
